ca.polymtl.inf3995.oronos.widgets.views

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • ca.polymtl.inf3995.oronos.widgets.views.OronosView
            • ca.polymtl.inf3995.oronos.widgets.containers.AbstractWidgetContainer<CAN>
              • ca.polymtl.inf3995.oronos.widgets.views.Plot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, DataDispatcher.CANDataListener, ContainableWidget

    public class Plot
extends AbstractWidgetContainer<CAN>
implements DataDispatcher.CANDataListener

    Plot

    The Plot class is a View that displays a single plot. Using the MPChart library to create the plot.
    Since:
    2018-04-12
    Version:
    0.0
    Author:
    Fabrice Charbonneau, FÃ©lix Boulet
